data.eml:eml: Re-evaluation of Pseudoparasitus (Gymnolaelaps) annectans (Womersley): a new genus and two new species (Acari: Mesostigmata: Laelapidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shaw, Matthew D. (2012): Re-evaluation of Pseudoparasitus (Gymnolaelaps) annectans (Womersley): a new genus and two new species (Acari: Mesostigmata: Laelapidae). Zootaxa 3453: 25-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282179
